summary: Ship can be the  players home, there are  interactive objects,  a merchant, workbench, treasures, and a little mission in this ship. Video Preview.
descriptionHtml:
(Finally finished uploading. God i hate my network)

If you are from Asia or can read Chinese, you can go [url=http://forum.gamer.com.tw/C.php?bsn=02526&snA=15687&subbsn=0&page=1#60794]here[/url] to find an other download site

[b]##Description##[/b]
Location: Solitude dock, won\'t move.
What on the ship:
[list]
[*][b]Book shelves, weapon rack, a balcony (with flower bed), all Workbench (except the smelter)[/b]
[*][b]1~2 containers[/b] each Workbench, and [b]4 containers[/b] in players room.
[*]A merchant(first mate actually) [b]sell all the materials, Enchanting type(Not all), black soul gem.[/b] And he has [b]10000 gold available for trading[/b].
[*]You [b]can climb up to tower[/b] on the deck.
[*][b]A little quest[/b] let you know what happened on this ship. Start the quest [b]from the first mate[/b].
[*][b]To open players room, you must finish the quest.[/b]
(If you don\'t want to through the mission, you can find an invisible box under the stairs, near players room. The key in it.)
[*]The ship have a secret room. [b]There are about 20,000 in it[/b]. Clues through the mission to know.
[/list]

[b]##Video Preview##[/b]
The video looks dark. but not in game.
You also can view those screenshots.

[url=http://youtu.be/q3eRJpfVjds]viedo here[/url]

[b]##Bug##[/b]
There are some problem with the Navmesh. Your partners will look stupid in this ship, they can get in but maybe can\'t get out. 
You can order him(or her) to wait outside(or dock), there is no enemy on ship anyway.
author: heyosteve
